headline: Charter WiFi 7 Launch And Cox Deal Reframe Growth And Valuation
summary: Charter Communications (NasdaqGS:CHTR) has launched what it calls the industry's first WiFi 7 service, Invincible WiFi, with integrated battery and 5G backup. The company is pairing the product rollout with a $1,000 savings pledge aimed at new mobile and broadband customers who switch from competitors. A pending acquisition of Cox Communications is expected to reshape Charter's scale and operational profile once completed. For you as an investor, this news sits at the intersection of...

headline: Charter Communications (CHTR) Expands it Fiber Internet Network
summary: Charter Communications, Inc. (NASDAQ:CHTR) is one of the Cheap NASDAQ Stocks To Buy in 2026. On February 13, Charter Communications, Inc. (NASDAQ:CHTR) announced that it is expanding its fiber internet network in rural Harrison County. The expansion targets more than 6,700 homes and businesses. ​Management noted that this expansion is part of the company’s broader […]

headline: SPECTRUM GUARANTEES $1,000 SAVINGS IN THE FIRST YEAR FOR CUSTOMERS WHO FLEE THE BIG 3
summary: Spectrum – America's Connectivity Company™ – has unveiled one of its most powerful value pledges to date, guaranteeing new customers $1,000 in savings their first year if they switch their mobile service from AT&T, T-Mobile or Verizon to at least two Unlimited lines of Spectrum Mobile and transfer their internet service from any provider to Spectrum Internet Advantage or a higher speed tier.

headline: Warner Bros. Discovery says Paramount made higher bid, board will weigh offer against Netflix deal
summary: If WBD deems the new Paramount offer superior, Netflix will have four days to improve its previously agreed-upon bid.
